title: Technology and Best Practices
text: Resource allocation in large-scale farming. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy.
